name: OoboloO
description:
You're a slime that's lost some of your blobs! Collect them and make your way to the exit while avoiding the vicious cave enemies - but be careful, as they are also your only means of maneuvering!

This was made by:

  • Connie Wan
  • Daisy Muradyan
  • Levi Lindsey
  • Zaven Muradyan

This game was created as a submission for Global Game Jam 2021. All design, code, images, sound effects, and music were created in under 48 hours.

The theme for the game jam was "lost and found". This game addresses the theme by having the player collect little bits of themselves that are scattered around the level, but while doing so the player also loses bits of themselves.

  • Global Game Jam post: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/ooboloo-2
  • Source code: https://github.com/levilindsey/global-game-jam-2021
